label: nutrientInfo
comment: The chemical elements and compounds that are necessary for plant growth, reproduction, metabolism.

label: soilType
comment: The type of soil corresponding to this observation, such as Alluvial SoilHealth, Black Cotton SoilHealth, Arid or Desert SoilHealth, etc.

label: electricalConductivity
comment: The measure of electrical conductivity of the entity corresponding to this observation.

label: soilSalinity
comment: The level of soil salinity. It is directly proportional to the measure of electrical conductivity of the soil moisture.

label: soilMoisture
comment: Volumetric Water Content (VMC) is the  numerical measure of soil moisture. It is simply the ratio of water volume to soil volume.

label: soilTexture
comment: Represents the texture of soil. It can take up values like sandy, silt, clay, loam.

label: pH
comment: The measure of the acidity or basicity.

label: soilQuality
comment: The quality of the soil which has been tested from the land parcel. ENUM [Good, Moderate, Poor].

label: topSoilDepth
comment: The measure of top soil layer, which contains the high nutrients and organic matter neccessary for plant growth.

label: waterRetentionCapacity
comment: The water holding capacity of the soil.

label: location
comment: Location of the sample corresponding to this observation

label: observationDateTime
comment: Last reported time of observation

label: siltLevel
comment: The proportion of silt in the soil composition

label: clayLevel
comment: The proportion of clay in the soil composition

label: loamLevel
comment: The proportion of loam in the soil composition

label: sandLevel
comment: The proportion of sand in the soil composition

label: soilClass
comment: The soil class may be specified as per the national system of soil classification or customizing the WRB(World Reference Base) codes.

label: soilCategory
comment: The soil category may be specified as per the national system of soil classification or customizing the WRB(World Reference Base) codes.

label: landIdentityInfo
comment: The unique land identification information corresponding to this observation.

label: cropSpeciesInfo
comment: Information of crops corresponding to this observation.

label: sampleID
comment: The unique ID representing the sample corresponding to this observation

label: sampleDateTime
comment: The date and time at which the sample is being collected corresponding to this observation.

label: testCentreID
comment: The unique ID of the centre at which the sample is being tested.

label: testCentreName
comment: The name of the centre at which the sample is being tested.

label: testCentreCode
comment: The unique code of the centre at which the sample is being tested.

label: testDateTime
comment: The date and time at which the sample is being tested in the laboratory or the testing centre.

label: healthCardNum
comment: The unique number assigned to the soil health card corresponding to this observation.

label: generalAdvisory
comment: A general advisory to the farmers, for the cultivation of crops in regards to the conditions of weather, soil ,land etc. It may include warnings of potential catastrophical events.

label: validFrom
comment: The instance from which an official report/document or consent or service corresponding to this observation is valid.

label: validTill
comment: The specific period of time during which a document, authorization, offer or permission remains legally or effectively acceptable/applicable.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.
